title: [Large-scale] Reinterpreting ICT in Virtual Learning Environments: Applying Mixed Methodologies for a Scientific Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Science Knowledge and Experience with ICT Tools
context.additional_context: Hybrid education program in smartphone-centric constrained environments emphasizing ICT reinterpretation competencies for workplace application

learning_goals: Learners can apply three reinterpretation categories (sociocultural-digital, critical-reflective, environmentalist) when designing science lessons using ICT in virtual learning environments
Learners can observe and analyze collaborative problem-solving processes using ICT tools in blended learning environments
Learners can develop smartphone-based science education content production and evaluation frameworks in limited technology environments

resources: Digital Instructional Materials Template for Science Teachers
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
